level.heading: Nomenclature.
level.text: The controlled substances listed or to be listed in the schedules in §§ 48-902.04, 48-902.06, 48-902.08, 48-902.10 and 48-902.12 are included by whatever official, common, usual, chemical, or trade name designated.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 4-29
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 4-29, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 48-901.02.
